message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. This way we both get a good amount and can finish the game quickly.
I'm willing to compromise. This way I'll get a decent amount and you'll still get something.
I'm still not happy with that offer.  Let's split the difference - I'll take 55, you take 45.  We both get something, and it's a fairer split.
I'm not willing to give up much more. This is a fair 50/50 split, and I think we should accept it.
